node.display_long_description:
Rec Room - Join the Club!

Rec Room is THE place for you and your friends to build and play games together. Party up with Rec Roomers from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore millions of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.
Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It’s the social app you play like a video game!

- Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
- Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
- Try your skill with the Maker Pen, the tool used by Rec Room creators to build everything from puppies to helicopters to entire worlds!
- Join the best community - Rec Room is a fun and welcoming place for people from all walks of life! Let us help you find people you’ll LOVE to hang out with.

Come and join the club!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Rec Room PATCH - the "Color Me Impressed" edition

This patch we have a few bug fixes for you, and some updates to Beta Content. Check it out!

## General Improvements

- Gift boxes now appear when you purchase consumables from the Laser Tag storefront.
- Fixed a crash on PS4 in Crescendo of the Blood Moon which sometimes occurred when dispatching an enemy.
- We've fixed the way fog is calculated on avatar faces!
- Fixed bug where disc golf hazard button sometimes did nothing when clicked.

## Beta Content Changes

- The filters in palette search have been updated. You will now find a few chips in different locations in palette search.
- Some chips have been renamed.
- New-style variables now support changed events. Each new variable name will add an event you can receive with an `Event Receiver` chip.
- New-style variables now have a different mesh, synced icons, and different port names.
- Many more chips now have icons.
- The Circuits V2 page has been reformatted in the palette.
- Many objects now longer check authority and can now be set by anyone. Objects without authority checks include: `Emitter V2`, `Point Light V2`, `Spot Light V2`, `SFX V2`, `Text V2`
- New Chips: `Creation Object Get Authority`, `Creation Object Is Local Player Authority`, `Get Authority`, `Get Local Player`, `Get Room Authority`, `Get Player Last Equipped Object`, `Get Equipped Objects`, `If I'm Authority`, `If I'm Room Authority`, `If Player Is Local`, `Player Get Is Local`, `Player Is Authority Of`
- FromCreationObject` will correctly connect to other chips again.
- An exception has been fixed in palette search when viewing from a second room.
- `Vector Gadget` no longer collides with things.

As always, thanks for playing Rec Room!

Please see here for convenient links to controls, tutorials, comfort options, etc.: https://recroom.com/community
We love to hear your feedback, so please don't hesitate to let us know what you think...

node.reviewDescription:
This is kinda an angry review and call to action by some random 14 year old to get everyone who quit playing again. These are my rules i’ve found work in rec room.
First thing- when you load in- take the time to navigate settings and adjust them to your liking. Go to experience then go to personal bubble and type off. The way to do actions like friend people is by high fiving/ fist bumping/ and shaking hands. You can also check play with adult players only which only halfway works
Second- you teleport? Maybe this isn’t the game for you tbh. You’ll get called a cheater a lot because level 50s do it to get a jump on competition in dodgeball
Third- the rec center button doesn’t work
Remember that
Don’t push it
Pretend
Fourth- there’s a search bar and you can find really awesome games in the play menu, however it’s kinda hard to navigate first time
If new
Click filters and go to originals
And play any “quest”
Rise of jumbotron (robot murdering rampage)
Golden trophy (goblins galore)
Crescendo of the blood moon (genuinely creepy but doesn’t work on quest 2)
Crimson cauldron (what’s that sound coming from the swamp)
Island pirate one or whatever I don’t play it (a three person sword/ musket fight where blocking a slash stuns enemies and anything can be used as a weapon)
Fifth- LEARN TO BUILD
IF YOU DON’T KNOW TRY TO FIND AN EVENT
Me and my friends now live in a massive mansion with moving cars below and all our rooms are decorated with our stuff- we built it from scratch and we all spawn in there when we turn rec room on so I’ll run into my friend just casually editing some stuff in the living room and the other shooting hoops when i turn it on. We spent a mere 7 hours in a row
Sixth- This game is not that childish
If your kid’s getting this game I suggest not
Kids are poisoning this game, however i made one cry the other day by shooting him over and over in a pvp room.
Last but not least- NEVER AND I MEAN NEVER UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES GO TO A FURRY EVENT IF YOU ARE ACTUALLY A FURRY i’m not but like
Even i can see how bad it is
That’s where the most slurs and racist jokes are hurled at people otherwise they usually keep it on the low


Well now get started or get back playing again because it’s a lot of fun
Every time I play i feel like pissing myself laughing and once you get good (took me a month to double arrow shot and learn to build) it’s just a blast and every-time I log in it takes away the crippling stack of hw in front of me and the sad lonely life in which I lead
Jk lol
